description:
Adding Milestone in chromium bug hunter output file and email. Also, fix some minor issues relating to empty status.


BUG=115503
TEST= locally executed the scripts and made sure it is working as intended.

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=124468

messages.text: LGTM, sorry I didn't see this until now. You'll still need a committer to LGTM though.

Dennis, can you look at this one, too?

Thanks.

Just 1 typo to fix.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9452025/diff/1/media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py
File media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9452025/diff/1/media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py#newcode260
media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py:260: 'state': entry.state.text if entry.status is not None else '',
entry.status --> entry.state

Thanks.

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9452025/diff/1/media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py
File media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/9452025/diff/1/media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py#newcode260
media/tools/bug_hunter/bug_hunter.py:260: 'state': entry.state.text if entry.status is not None else '',
On 2012/02/28 02:10:59, dennis_jeffrey wrote:
> entry.status --> entry.state

Done.

subject: Adding Milestone in chromium bug hunter output file and email.
